hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Bright4Event

whatIs.a: Bright4Event is Vietnam's leading professional event voting and interaction platform. We provide comprehensive solutions for Galas, Company Parties, Year-end Parties with features including: QR Code Check-in, Real-time Voting, Lucky Draw, and live results display on LED screens.

eventTypes.q: What types of events can be organized with Bright4Event?
eventTypes.a: Bright4Event is suitable for all types of corporate events: Gala Dinners, Company Parties, Year-end Parties, Award Ceremonies, Team Building, Product Launches, Conferences, and other internal events. The system flexibly handles from 50 to 5000+ guests.

difference.q: How is Bright4Event different from other platforms?
difference.a: Bright4Event focuses 100% on corporate events with: (1) Elegant interface with custom branding capability, (2) Fast QR code check-in, (3) Real-time voting displayed directly on LED, (4) Fair and transparent Lucky Draw, (5) 24/7 technical support at events.

createEvent.q: How do I create my first event?
createEvent.a: It's very simple! (1) Register an account at Bright4Event.vn, (2) Choose a suitable service package, (3) Fill in event information, upload logo and theme colors, (4) Add voting categories and candidates, (5) Activate and share link/QR code with guests. The whole process takes only 15 minutes!

editEvent.q: Can I edit event information after it's published?
editEvent.a: Yes! You can edit most event information at any time: event name, description, banner image, voting categories, time. However, for Enterprise packages, you should contact the support team for the most optimal advice.

addAwards.q: How do I add voting categories?
addAwards.a: Access Dashboard ‚Üí Select event ‚Üí "Categories" tab ‚Üí Click "Add new category" ‚Üí Enter category name, description, upload candidate photos ‚Üí Save. You can add unlimited categories and candidates depending on your service package.

voteLimit.q: Can I limit the number of votes per person?
voteLimit.a: Yes! Bright4Event allows you to set: (1) Maximum votes per person (e.g., 3 votes), (2) Vote once for each category, (3) Only allow voting after check-in. This helps ensure fairness and transparency.

plans.q: What packages are available? How to pay?
plans.a: Bright4Event has 3 packages: (1) Basic (50-200 guests) - $120, (2) Pro (200-500 guests) - $200, (3) Enterprise (500+ guests) - Contact us. Payment via Bank Transfer, VNPay, or Momo. Full VAT invoice provided.

invoice.a: Yes! We issue full VAT invoices for all service packages. After payment, just provide company information (name, tax ID, address), and we'll send the electronic invoice within 24 hours.

refund.q: Are refunds available if the event is cancelled?
refund.a: Yes, with the following policy: (1) Cancel 7+ days before: 100% refund, (2) Cancel 3-7 days before: 70% refund, (3) Cancel within 3 days: 50% refund. If the event is postponed, you can change the date for free.

trial.a: Yes! We have a 14-day Free Trial for up to 50 guests. You can test all features: QR check-in, voting, lucky draw, analytics. No credit card required to register.

ledDisplay.q: How do I display results on LED?
ledDisplay.a: Very simple! (1) Open Dashboard on laptop, (2) Select "LED Mode", (3) Connect laptop to LED screen/projector via HDMI, (4) Press F11 for fullscreen. Results will automatically update in real-time. We also provide on-site technical support for Enterprise packages.

connectionError.q: How does the system handle connection errors?
connectionError.a: Bright4Event has an automatic backup mechanism: (1) Vote data is stored on AWS cloud servers, (2) If connection is lost, votes are still saved offline on the device, (3) When reconnected, data automatically syncs. We guarantee 99.9% uptime.

support247.a: Yes! We have 24/7 support via: (1) Hotline: (+84) 901 333 434, (2) Email: code4change.co@gmail.com, (3) Live chat on website, (4) On-site technical support for Enterprise packages. Average response time < 5 minutes.

api.a: Yes! Enterprise packages support API for integration with your internal systems: (1) Sync guest lists, (2) Export vote data, (3) Real-time webhooks. Full API documentation at docs.Bright4Event.vn

security.a: Absolutely! Bright4Event strictly complies with: (1) SSL/TLS 256-bit encryption, (2) Storage on AWS Singapore, (3) Daily automatic backups, (4) No data sharing with third parties, (5) GDPR and PDPA compliance. Your data is always safe.

createFirst.q: How do I create my first event?
createFirst.a: Log into your account, choose a suitable package from the Pricing page, then access Dashboard and click 'Create new event'. Fill in basic information, upload logo and you're ready!

customizeColor.q: Can I change event interface colors?
customizeColor.a: Yes, you can fully customize colors, logo and theme in the event Settings section. Premium and Enterprise packages also support deeper custom branding.

realtimeResults.q: How do I display real-time results?
realtimeResults.a: Access the 'Results' section in event Dashboard, select 'Live Display' mode and copy the link. Open this link in a browser connected to LED screen or projector.

exportData.q: Can I export vote data to Excel?
exportData.a: Yes, in the Analytics section of each event, you can export vote, check-in and statistics data to Excel (.xlsx), CSV or JSON formats with just one click.
